WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Hi,

We're closing this work item as we found out that this other one (http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/workitem/3862) is reporting the same problem.

You might also find the following blog post useful, where the workaround proposed in the aforementioned work item is explained in further detail:

http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami/2011/09/22/prism-v4-regioncontext-lost-when-removing-a-view-from-a-region/

Thanks,

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
